trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There was one other sighting in San Francisco on or around June 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsLarge sudden illuminations of cloud cover, twice red, three times blue at long, random intervals. Seen through living room window with two other witnesses in San Francisco, the neighborhood of Ingleside. A short buzzing sound was heard after each flash. In addition to the sound, other witnesses experieced a mild, electrical sensation shortly afterwards.
Summary: Large sudden illuminations of cloud cover, twice red, three times blue at long, random intervals.
